00051     public static function create( &$arOptions = array() )
00052     {
00053         $_bHaveButtonBar = false;
00054 
00055         //  Make sure we have some form fields...
00056         if ( ! $_arFields = PS::o( $arOptions, 'fields', null, true ) )
00057             throw new CPSException( 'You must define form fields to use this method.' );
00058 
00059         //  Return as string?
00060         $_bReturnString = PS::o( $arOptions, 'returnString', false, true );
00061         $_showLegend = PS::o( $arOptions, 'showLegend', true, true );
00062         $_bShowDates = PS::o( $arOptions, 'showDates', true, true );
00063         $_bValidate = PS::o( $arOptions, 'validate', false );
00064         $_bErrorSummary = PS::o( $arOptions, 'errorSummary', true, true );
00065         $_errorSummaryOptions = PS::o( $arOptions, 'errorSummaryOptions', array(), true );
00066         $_errorSummaryHeader = PS::o( $_errorSummaryOptions, 'header', null, true );
00067         $_sFormId = PS::o( $arOptions, 'id', 'ps-edit-form' );
00068         $_eUIStyle = PS::o( $arOptions, 'uiStyle', PS::UI_DEFAULT );
00069 
00070         if ( ! isset( $arOptions['name'] ) ) $arOptions['name'] = $_sFormId;
00071 
00072         //  Our model?
00073         $_oModel = PS::o( $arOptions, 'formModel', null, true );
00074 
00075         //  Throw in a neato keano flash span
00076         if ( null === PS::_gs( 'psForm-flash-html' ) && ! PS::o( $arOptions, 'noFlash', false, true ) )
00077         {
00078             $_flashClass = PS::o( $options, 'flashSuccessClass', 'operation-result-success' );
00079             
00080             if ( null === ( $_message = PS::_gf( 'success' ) ) )
00081             {
00082                 if ( null !== ( $_message = PS::_gf( 'failure' ) ) )
00083                     $_flashClass = PS::o( $options, 'flashFailureClass', 'operation-result-failure' );
00084             }
00085             
00086             $_spanId = PS::o( $options, 'flashSpanId', 'operation-result', true );
00087             PS::_ss( 'psForm-flash-html', PS::tag( 'span', array( 'id' => $_spanId, 'class' => $_flashClass ), $_message ) );
00088 
00089             //  Register a nice little fader...
00090             $_fader =<<<SCRIPT
00091 $('#{$_spanId}').fadeIn('500',function(){
00092     $(this).delay(3000).fadeOut(3500);
00093 });
00094 SCRIPT;
00095 
00096             PS::_rs( $_sFormId . '.' . $_spanId . '.fader', $_fader, CClientScript::POS_READY );
00097         }
00098 
00099         //  Let's begin...
00100         $_sOut = PS::beginFormEx( $arOptions );
00101         
00102         //  Error summary wanted?
00103         if ( $_oModel && $_bErrorSummary )
00104             $_sOut .= PS::errorSummary( $_oModel, $_errorSummaryHeader, null, $_errorSummaryOptions );
00105 
00106         //  Now create form fields...
00107         foreach ( $_arFields as $_arValue )
00108         {
00109             $_bPassed = true;
00110 
00111             //  First element must be type...
00112             $_sType = array_shift( $_arValue );
00113 
00114             //  Handle a runtime conditional column display
00115             if ( $_sCondition = PS::o( $_arValue, 'condition', null, true ) )
00116             {
00117                 if ( is_bool( $_sCondition ) )
00118                     $_bPassed = $_sCondition;
00119                 else
00120                     $_bPassed = eval( 'return(' . $_sCondition . ');' );
00121             }
00122 
00123             if ( $_bPassed )
00124             {
00125                 switch ( strtolower( $_sType ) )
00126                 {
00127                     case 'html':
00128                         $_sOut .= implode( $_arValue );
00129                         break;
00130 
00131                     case 'hidden':
00132                     case 'hiddenfield':
00133                         $_sType = 'hiddenfield';
00134                         //  Intentional drop through...
00135 
00136                     case 'beginfieldset':
00137                     case 'endfieldset':
00138                         $_sOut .= call_user_func_array( array( 'PS', $_sType ), $_arValue );
00139                         break;
00140 
00141                     case 'submit':
00142                         //  Fix up the argument array
00143                         $_arSubmit = ( is_array( $_arValue ) && count( $_arValue ) == 1 ) ? $_arValue[0] : $_arValue;
00144                         $_sLabel = PS::o( $_arSubmit, 'label', $_sType, true );
00145                         if ( PS::UI_JQUERY == $_eUIStyle ) $_arSubmit['jqui'] = true;
00146                         $_arValue = array( $_sLabel, $_arSubmit, 'formId' => $_sFormId );
00147                         $_sOut .= call_user_func_array( array( 'PS', 'submitButtonBar' ), $_arValue );
00148                         $_bHaveButtonBar = true;
00149                         break;
00150 
00151                     default:
00152                         $_sMethod = $_sType;
00153 
00154                         switch ( $_sType )
00155                         {
00156                             case 'label':   //  No special array manipulation needed.
00157                                 $_sMethod = $_sType;
00158                                 break;
00159 
00160                             default:        //  Format for PS::field() call
00161                                 //  Push model into the front of the array...
00162                                 array_unshift( $_arValue, $_sType, $_oModel );
00163                                 $_sMethod = 'field';
00164                                 break;
00165                         }
00166 
00167                         //  Make the field
00168                         $_sOut .= call_user_func_array( array( 'PS', $_sMethod ), $_arValue );
00169 
00170                         //  CKEditor needs special handing for validate...
00171                         if ( $_bValidate && $_sType == PS::CKEDITOR )
00172                         {
00173                             $_sFieldId = PS::getLastFieldId();
00174                             $_sFormId = PS::getCurrentFormId();
00175                             $_sScript = "jQuery('#{$_sFormId}').submit(function(e){ jQuery('#{$_sFieldId}').val(CKEDITOR.instances.{$_sFieldId}.getData()); return true; });";
00176                             PS::_rs( '#psForm.ckeditor.' . $_sFieldId . '.get_data', $_sScript, CClientScript::POS_READY );
00177                         }
00178                         break;
00179                 }
00180             }
00181         }
00182 
00183         //  Does user want dates? Show 'em
00184         if ( $_bShowDates && $_oModel instanceof CPSModel && ! $_oModel->isNewRecord )
00185             $_sOut .= $_oModel->showDates();
00186 
00187         //  Add legend
00188         $_requiredLabel = PS::getRequiredLabel();
00189 
00190         if ( $_showLegend && $_requiredLabel )
00191         {
00192             $_sOut .= '<div class="ps-form-legend">Fields with ' . $_requiredLabel . ' are required</div>';
00193         }
00194 
00195         //  Ok, done building form...
00196         $_sOut .= PS::endForm();
00197         
00198         //  Does user want data returned?
00199         if ( $_bReturnString ) return $_sOut;
00200 
00201         //  Guess not, just spit it out...
00202         echo $_sOut;
00203     }

00234     public static function formHeaderEx( $sTitle, $arOptions = array() )
00235     {
00236         $arMenuItems = PS::o( $arOptions, 'menuItems', array() );
00237 
00238         $sDivClass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'divClass', 'ps-form-header' );
00239         $bShowFlashDiv = PS::o( $arOptions, 'showFlashDiv', true );
00240         $_sHtmlInjection = PS::o( $arOptions, 'htmlInject', null );
00241         $_sFlashMessage = PS::o( $arOptions, 'flashMessage' );
00242         $_sSubHeader = PS::o( $arOptions, 'subHeader', null );
00243         $_sFormId = PS::o( $arOptions, 'formId', 'ps-edit-form', true );
00244 
00245         $_bIcon = false;
00246         $_sClass = $_sLink = $_sOut = null;
00247         $_sFlash = $bShowFlashDiv ? PS::flashMessage( 'success', true ) : null;
00248         $_sExtra = null;//'style="margin-bottom:' . ( $_sFlash ? '32px' : '10px' ) . '";"';
00249 
00250         if ( $_sFlashMessage ) $_sFlashMessage = '<div class="ps-subheader-flash">' . $_sFlashMessage . '</div>';
00251 
00252         if ( in_array( 'menuButtons', $arOptions ) )
00253         {
00254             $arMenuItems = array_merge(
00255                 $arMenuItems,
00256                 self::createMenuButtons(
00257                     PS::o( $arOptions, 'itemName', 'item', true ),
00258                     PS::o( $arOptions, 'menuButtons', array(), true ),
00259                     PS::o( $arOptions, 'adminName', null, true ),
00260                     PS::o( $arOptions, 'adminAction', null, true )
00261                 )
00262             );
00263         }
00264 
00265         //  Create menu
00266         foreach ( $arMenuItems as $_sId => $_arItem )
00267         {
00268             $_sOnClick = null;
00269             $_sAccess = PS::o( $_arItem, 'access', null, true );
00270 
00271             //  Can user have this item?
00272             if ( $_sAccess && $_sAccess != Yii::app()->user->accessRole )
00273                 continue;
00274 
00275             $_sLabel = PS::o( $_arItem, 'label', $sTitle, true );
00276             $_sLink = PS::normalizeUrl( PS::o( $_arItem, 'url', array('#'), true ) );
00277             $_arItem['formId'] = $_sFormId;
00278             $_sOut .= PS::jquiButton( $_sLabel, $_sLink, $_arItem );
00279         }
00280 
00281         return <<<HTML
00282         <div class="{$sDivClass}" {$_sExtra}>
00283             <h1 class="ps-form-header-left">{$sTitle}</h1>{$_sFlash}
00284             <p style="clear:both;">{$_sOut}</p>
00285             <div style="clear:both"></div>
00286             {$_sHtmlInjection}{$_sFlashMessage}
00287         </div>
00288         {$_sSubHeader}
00289 HTML;
00290 
00291     }

00297     public static function formHeader( $sTitle, $arMenuItems = array(), $sDivClass = 'ps-form-header', $bShowFlashDiv = true, $_sHtmlInjection = null )
00298     {
00299         //  Be nice and let people call this instead
00300         if ( in_array( 'menuItems', $arMenuItems ) ) return self::formHeaderEx( $sTitle, $arMenuItems );
00301 
00302         //  Otherwise, screw you
00303         trigger_error( 'CPSForm::formHeader is deprecated. Please use formHeaderEx instead', defined( E_USER_DEPRECATED ) ? E_USER_DEPRECATED : E_USER_WARNING );
00304     }

00311     public static function searchBar( $arOptions = array() )
00312     {
00313         $_arFields = PS::o( $arOptions, 'fields', array(), true );
00314         $_sDivClass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'class', 'ps-search-bar', true );
00315 
00316         foreach ( $_arFields as $_sName => $_arField )
00317         {
00318             $_sTitle = PS::o( $_arField, 'title', 'Search', true );
00319             $_eType = PS::o( $_arField, 'type', 'text', true );
00320             $_arTypeOptions = PS::o( $_arField, 'typeOptions', array(), true );
00321             $_arData = PS::o( $_arField, 'data', array(), true );
00322 
00323             //  Setup some css...
00324             $_sClass = PS::o( $_arTypeOptions, 'class', null, true );
00325             $_arTypeOptions['class'] = trim( $_sClass );
00326 
00327             $_arTypeOptions['id'] = PS::o( $_arTypeOptions, 'id', PS::getWidgetId( self::SEARCH_PREFIX ) . '_' . $_eType );
00328             if ( ! is_numeric( $_eType ) ) $_arTypeOptions['size'] = PS::o( $_arTypeOptions, 'size', '15' );
00329 
00330             if ( $_sTitle ) $_sTitle .= ':';
00331 
00332             $_sField = PS::activefield( $_eType, null, $_sName, $_arTypeOptions, array(), $_arData );
00333             $_sLabel = strtr( self::$m_sSearchFieldLabelTemplate, array( '{fieldId}' => $_arTypeOptions['id'], '{title}' => $_sTitle ) );
00334             $_sOut .= strtr( self::$m_sSearchFieldTemplate, array( '{label}' => $_sLabel, '{field}' => $_sField ) );
00335         }
00336 
00337         return <<<HTML
00338         <div class="{$_sDivClass}">{$_sOut}</div>
00339 HTML;
00340     }

00347     public static function createMenuButtons( $sItemName, $arWhich = array(), $sAdminName = null, $sAdminAction = null )
00348     {
00349         $_arOut = array();
00350 
00351         if ( null === $sAdminName ) $sAdminName = ucfirst( $sItemName ) . ' Manager';
00352         if ( null === $sAdminAction ) $sAdminAction = array( 'admin' );
00353 
00354         foreach ( $arWhich as $_sButton => $_arOptions )
00355         {
00356             if ( is_numeric( $_sButton ) && ! is_array( $_arOptions ) )
00357                 $_sButton = $_arOptions;
00358 
00359             $_iButton = CPSDataGrid::getMenuButtonType( $_sButton );
00360 
00361             switch ( $_iButton )
00362             {
00363                 case PS::ACTION_PREVIEW:
00364                     $_arOut[ 'preview' ] = array(
00365                         'label' => 'Preview',
00366                         'url' => array( '#' ),
00367                         'icon' => 'lightbulb',
00368                         'id' => PS::o( $_arOptions, 'id' ),
00369                     );
00370 
00371                     if ( $_sTarget = PS::o( $_arOptions, 'target' ) )
00372                         $_arOut['preview']['onClick'] = '$(\'' . $_sTarget . '\').toggle(); return false;';
00373                     break;
00374 
00375                 case PS::ACTION_VIEW:
00376                     $_arOut[ 'view' ] = array(
00377                         'label' => 'View',
00378                         'url' => array( 'show' ),
00379                         'icon' => 'check',
00380                     );
00381                     break;
00382 
00383                 case PS::ACTION_CREATE:
00384                     $_arOut[ 'new' ] = array(
00385                         'label' => 'New ' . $sItemName,
00386                         'url' => array( 'create' ),
00387                         'icon' => 'pencil',
00388                     );
00389                     break;
00390 
00391                 case PS::ACTION_EDIT:
00392                     $_arOut[ 'update' ] = array(
00393                         'label' => intval( $_sButton ) == PS::ACTION_EDIT ? 'Edit' : 'Update',
00394                         'url' => array( 'update' ),
00395                         'icon' => 'pencil',
00396                     );
00397                     break;
00398 
00399                 case PS::ACTION_SAVE:
00400                     $_arOut[ 'save' ] = array(
00401                         'label' => 'Save',
00402                         'url' => '_submit_',
00403                         'icon' => 'disk',
00404                     );
00405                     break;
00406 
00407                 case PS::ACTION_DELETE:
00408                     $_arOut[ 'delete' ] = array(
00409                         'label' => 'Delete',
00410                         'url' => array( 'delete' ),
00411                         'confirm' => 'Do you really want to delete this ' . $sItemName . '?',
00412                         'icon' => 'trash',
00413                     );
00414                     break;
00415 
00416                 case PS::ACTION_RETURN:
00417                 case PS::ACTION_CANCEL:
00418                     $_arOut[ 'cancel' ] = array(
00419                         'label' => 'Cancel',
00420                         'url' => $sAdminAction,
00421                         'icon' => 'cancel',
00422                     );
00423                     break;
00424 
00425                 case PS::ACTION_ADMIN:
00426                     $_arOut[ 'return' ] = array(
00427                         'label' => $sAdminName,
00428                         'url' => $sAdminAction,
00429                         'icon' => 'arrowreturnthick-1-w',
00430                     );
00431                     break;
00432 
00433                 case PS::ACTION_LOCK:
00434                     $_arOut[ 'lock' ] = array(
00435                         'label' => 'Lock',
00436                         'url' => array( 'lock' ),
00437                         'icon' => 'unlocked',
00438                     );
00439                     break;
00440 
00441                 case PS::ACTION_UNLOCK:
00442                     $_arOut[ 'unlock' ] = array(
00443                         'label' => 'Unlock',
00444                         'url' => array( 'unlock' ),
00445                         'icon' => 'locked',
00446                     );
00447                     break;
00448             }
00449         }
00450 
00451         //  Return our buttons
00452         return $_arOut;
00453     }
